jobDescription: The FCC Preschool is seeking an enthusiastic person who wants to make a difference in young children’s lives by caring for their well-being and creating learning experiences for them to explore. Must love working with children, be flexible, dependable, work hard, have fun, and be a team player. Can you play nicely in a sandbox with others? Then we want you to be a part of our staff!  Teachers work with children in groups or one on one, depending on the needs of children and subject matter. Plan and carry out a curriculum that targets different areas of child development, such as language, motor, and social skills. Organize activities so children can learn about the world, explore interests, and develop talents. Watch for signs of emotional or developmental problems in children and bring problems to the attention of Lead Teacher. Keep records of students’ progress, routines, and interests, and keep parents informed about their child’s development.  Must meet state qualifications for this position and have references attesting to character and child care ability. In addition, must have nine months experience in early childhood education. Personal qualifications include the ability to interact effectively with children and parents, work cooperatively with other team members, and be flexible.
